name: The History Channel: The Great Battles of Rome
name_original: The History Channel: The Great Battles of Rome
description:
The History Channel: The Great Battles of Rome is a strategy game developed by Slitherine Software. It came out on 08-06-2007. It was published by Black Bean Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The History Channel: The Great Battles of Rome on PC.
